title: Google Play system update for March 2022 rolling out with new Play Games privacy settings and more
content:
For the past few months, Google has finally been showing a changelog for its monthly system updates that roll out to Android, Wear OS, Android TV, and other platforms via the Play Store. Today, the March 2022 changelog went live with updates to Play Games privacy and more.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Play system update for March 2022 rolling out with new Play Games privacy settings and more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The March 2022 Google Play system update delivers a bunch of new bug fixes, and also adds new privacy settings to Google Play Games.
